Author: lilmissdisappearing
Text: Yup, I came here to say this! Our height difference is just a few inches, so my husband's stuff is like a size too big for me. It's usually quite convenient, but definitely no "smol in cloth" feels.

Author: CraneWifee
Text: Ugh my SO is average height and lean so his shirts fit me fine. Like a little give because of the cut but fine. My goal is to be small enough that they look baggy on me.   It’s the only time I miss my ex lol. He was 6’3 and broad shouldered. His shirts were almost dresses on me.
